record.dc:title: 67Lu92 Koger's Island, Lauderdale County, Alabama. Artifacts associated with Burial #20.
record.wpa:narrative: Artifacts associated with Burial #20. From top left: F.S. #56 (deer ulna awl); F.S. #55 (chert point); F.S. #52 (16 perforated bear teeth); F.S. #61 (chert knife); F.S. #54 (chert point); F.S. #60 (3 bird sternums) in middle of photo; F.S. #61 (copper stained needle); F.S. #57 (bird metatarsal awl); F.S. #50 (stone palette); F.S. #s 59 & 58 (bird metatarsal awls).
